revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Network Everywhere |model=NWR04B |revision= |upc=745883553594 |ean= |asin=B00008BLEB |price= |est_release_date=01/23/2003 |fcc_date=12/17/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Runtop |manuf_model=WR1133 |manuf_rev=Rev CG |availability=uncommon |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PKW-NWR04B |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX84200 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, |serial=yes,, 8-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_module=Runtop WA1113 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C502A |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF3000 |wi1_chip3_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip3_model=RF2948B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.4.19;-uc1-cx84200-4; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=wireless |default_ssid_regex=^wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Cable/DSL Router with 4-Port Switch}} :[http://www.networkeverywhere.com/support/nwr04bsupport.asp Support page] | [ftp://ftp.networkeverywhere.com/nwr04b_ug.pdf User guide] :[http://www.runtop.com.tw/DC/Firmware/20041115/SPWR1133-3190-NB1F.zip FW WR1133 DL] {{WiFiCert|W000805|02/10/2003}} :"PCWA113-000-AA400" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=290196 PCMCIA card]. :"PCWR113-000-CE500" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=290196 main board]. Differences between the different ''Runtop'' units ([http://www.sitecom.com/showdownload.php?id=1286 source]).. *WR1133, metal casing, integral antenna *WR1134, metal casing, removable antenna (RP-SMA?) *WR1135, metal casing, PCMCIA slot *WR1136, plastic casing, built-in PCMCIA card *WR1137, plastic casing, integral antenna ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.linux-hacker.net/cgi-bin/UltraBoard/UltraBoard.pl?Action=ShowPost&Board=RG&Post=2&Idle=0&Sort=0&Order=Descend&Page=0 codeman's posts on '''linux-hacker.net'''] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20051122092423/http://www.linux-hacker.net/nwr04b/nwr04b-inside.JPG Internal shot (via archive.org)] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20060427094612/http://www.linux-hacker.net/nwr04b/boot.txt Boot log (via archive.org)] *[http://www.saintaardvarkthecarpeted.com/nwr04b/ aardvark's NWR04B page] :It looks like this router was manufactured or rebranded by ''[[Runtop]]'' WR1133. :''Network Everywhere'' sold this unit as the [[Network Everywhere NWR04B|NWR04B]] by brand [[Cisco]]/[[Linksys]], :which makes it seem likely that this is also the same as [[Linksys]] BEFW11S4. :It also seems to be the same as the ''[[Repotec]]'' RP-WR1134 or IP2014. 
cat /proc/cpuinfo
Processor       : Conexant CX84200 rev 1 (v3l)
BogoMIPS        : 6.57
Hardware        : cx84200
Revision        : 0000
Serial          : 0000000000000000
